participant_1.name: Alex Carter
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, with a passion for storytelling and exploration.
participant_1.background: i played football for a division a college. i try various coffees as a hobby. i am a huge star wars fan. i enjoy poetry.

participant_2.name: Sophie Turner
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and curious, always eager to try new cuisines and cultures.
participant_2.background: i've been traveling the world for a years. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it. i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. i've been trying all types of food everywhere i go. hey there i am 23 and i love food.

content.text: Good to see you! I like to read and write poetry.
i don't really work anymore , i mostly just travel the world
I like to read a lot. I like to read.
I like to read a lot
I'm old enough to be a kid
No, I do not. I am a huge fan of star wars.
